column1: }}'''Oromendil''' was the second child and oldest son of [[Nolondil]], the brother of [[Tar-Amandil]], [[King of Númenor]]. Though he left descendants, nothing of their lives was recorded.<ref>{{UT
Oromendil means "Devoted to [[Oromë]]" in [[Quenya]] (from ''-[[dil]]'' = "friend, lover, devoted to").
